actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate segments of the York River and associated tributaries for study for potential inclusion in the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
short_title: York River Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 2013
subjects: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

titles.title: York River Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 2013
A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate segments of the York River and associated tributaries for study for potential inclusion in the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
